name: Echoes of Ambition: Choose Your Own Odyssey
name_original: Echoes of Ambition: Choose Your Own Odyssey
description: This is an interactive tale set in the world of 19th century France. The story follows the journey of a young writer named Lucien, as he navigates the world of literature, love, and ambition. The reader will make choices on behalf of Lucien, which will determine his path and ultimately lead to one of several possible endings. Will Lucien pursue his dreams at any cost, or will he sacrifice his ambitions for the sake of love? The reader's choices will shape the story and the fate of the characters, in a journey of self-discovery and consequence.
